thread.title: Dion Hobbz
thread.title_full: Simple Fishing reviewed by Dion Hobbz

author: Dion Hobbz
title: Dion Hobbz
text: As I am about to recieve my 4th package from Simple Fishing my daughter was asking when the next one arrives. She loves the surprise that come in the mail box and now she is creating a stock set of lures for herself to use once we get out to fish this year. It's a monthly reminder to her of the awesome times she had last year about going out with her friend on the dock and just chatting, or losing 6 of dad's lures on the next trip or even the fish her friend caught that was just as exciting to her as if it was her own. Simple Fishing is a monthly reminder of the great memories had and the new ones that are to come!
